abstract: Hamilton Lane, a private equity firm, is said to be raising its second fund of funds from Brazilian investors.
snippet: Hamilton Lane, a private equity firm, is said to be raising its second fund of funds from Brazilian investors.
lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO — The private equity firm Hamilton Lane is raising its second fund of funds here from local investors, seeking 300 million reais, or about $90 million, according to a person with knowledge of its plans.

headline.main: Private Equity Firms Raise Funds in Brazil Despite Challenges
